overview: Mehar is the village kabaddi champion that children idolize as a role model. With everything going in the right direction there is a chain of events that evolve to turn the tables for the worse. A feud that started between Jind Kaur and Chandu Pehlwan has put a target on Mehar's back to bear fruits.
tagline: Mehar is the village kabaddi champion that children idolize as a role model.
title: Kande
